* Represents a Duke bot. This is also the main class of duke project.
* You should have your own function to generate a response to user input.
* Replace this stub with your completed method.
* @param filePath the file path where the bot stores its data collected from the user in.
* processes different requests which is decided by the first token of the message user entered.
* @param str the first token of the message user entered.
* @throws InvalidKeyException if the first token entered is not a valid command.
* @throws IllegalArgumentException if the tokens entered after the first token are not correctly formatted.
* @throws EmptyDescriptionException if the user only entered the first token.
throw new InvalidKeyException("Try to say something to me.");
throw new InvalidKeyException("OOPS!!! I'm sorry, but I don't know what that means :-(");
* EmptyDescriptionException extends from Exception class and handle error if the user input is lack of description.

* shows a specific message when a Task in the list has been deleted from the list.

<AnchorPane maxHeight="Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="790.0" prefWidth="861.0" style="-fx-background-color: #808080;" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/11.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="MainWindow">
<TextField fx:id="userInput" layoutY="737.0" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="745.0" style="-fx-background-color: #808080;" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="1.0">
<Button fx:id="sendButton" layoutX="745.0" layoutY="748.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="117.0" text="Send" textFill="#2681c3">

<ScrollPane fx:id="scrollPane" fitToHeight="true" fitToWidth="true" hbarPolicy="NEVER" hvalue="1.0" layoutY="-2.0" prefHeight="753.0" prefWidth="861.0" style="-fx-background-color: #808080;" vvalue="1.0">
<VBox fx:id="dialogContainer" maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" style="-fx-background-color: #808080;">
